rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear the Imperial Army captured
those dirty bandits who razed
Iraada Village.

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Guess things'll be more peaceful
around here for now.

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0003
rows.name:
It's a real shame what happened
to all the villagers, though.

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0004
rows.name:
If nothing else, I'm going to miss
those juicy Moonbeam Bananas
they produced!

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh yeah, I heard that boy Otto was
talking about came from Iraada, too.

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Sounds like he was up to a spot of
mischief, but now he's straightened
up and is working hard in Avaritia.

rows.label: tlk41700122_03_msg0007
rows.name:
Here's hoping he manages to put that
tragedy behind him and grow up strong.
